main.name: Baptiste Gislot
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer Student at Wild Code School
main.description: Currently studying web development in Nantes, I am looking for an internship starting in February 2020
main.bio: After 5 years as an IT Project Manager in a nuclear power plant, i had to see other things. That is why I went to live on the Reunion Island for a year where I did some volunteering. After that I wanted a new challenge: learning web development ! I am eager to start a career in this field !
main.contactmessage: If you want to get in touch with me, just fill in this form.

work.title: Project Manager

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
